facts.text: I'm half purple and half yellow! My colors fade into each other like a beautiful sunset.
I like to swim upside down under rock ledges! It confuses predators about which way is up.
I'm a cleaner fish! Bigger fish visit me so I can eat parasites off their skin.
I live in caves and crevices in coral reefs. My home is my castle!
I'm very territorial! I'll chase away any fish that comes too close to my favorite hiding spot.

profile.habitat: Coral reefs in the Caribbean Sea
profile.diet: Zooplankton and parasites from other fish
